interactivity.to_get_this_event: Have 20+ Sara and Haruka Lust before starting the event chain. Autoplays after " Tokimeki Labyrinth " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " Three Amigos " .
interactivity.to_miss_this_event: Have less than 20 Lust with Sara or Haruka before Three Amigos . Replaced by Swallowed Whole .

progression.synopsis: As Sensei assists Sara and Haruka in decorating the bar, the three decide to take a quick break after Haruka becomes fed up with Sara's teasing.
trivia: There is variation in the dialogue depending on the following: If Sensei saw Bad Kitty . If Sensei saw Medical Assistance . If Sensei asked Sara to refer to him as "Haruka" during Zero Friction .
If Sensei asked Sara to refer to him as "Haruka" during Zero Friction .

changelog: This Event was added in Update .22.
